title: Our Journey
text: Our journey began long before Higanlabs, with successful ventures like Nepalgunj Food and Localtarkari, which laid the foundation for our entrepreneurial spirit and technological expertise. Over the years, we have partnered with IT companies worldwide, assisting them in scaling their operations and developing robust solutions that meet their growing needs.At Higanlabs, we are passionate about creating opportunities within Nepal by providing direct and indirect employment to over 200 individuals.
